channel.title: -Auto alcher - [Made with autoitv3]
channel.description:
Hey, so one day i was bored so i made a auto alcher with a decent antiban its made so that you can sit there at the computer while semi paying attention and high alch!
how to use: show ALL spells in order!
-Future updates-(1 = i can do 2 = i need help 3 = i really need help with)
-Basic gui-1 -number of alchs to complete-2 -auto login-3 -randomly checking magic xp-2 -randomly qcing magic level-2 -checking if player is in random if is then logging out-3
Use this Version if your using rsbuddy client(maximised) [code]HotKeySet("{F6}", "stop") $answer = MsgBox(4, "AutoAlch Version 1.2", "Press F6 to stop. Start?") $rand = Random(600,900) If $answer = 7 Then MsgBox(0, "AutoAlch", "Thank you for using!") Exit EndIf SLeep($rand + 500) While 1 mousemove(830,443) SLeep($rand + 120) MouseClick("left",830,443,1) SLeep($rand + 175) mouseclick("left",830,443,1) SLeep($rand + 175) mouseclick("left",830,443,1) SLeep($rand + 100) wend Func Stop() MsgBox(0, "AutoAlch", "Thank you for using!") Exit 0 EndFunc [/code] Use this version if your using google chrome: [code] HotKeySet("{F6}", "stop") $answer = MsgBox(4, "AutoAlch Version 1.2", "Press F6 to stop. Start?") $rand = Random(600,900) If $answer = 7 Then MsgBox(0, "AutoAlch", "Thank you for using!") Exit EndIf SLeep($rand + 500) While 1 mousemove(838,482) SLeep($rand + 120) MouseClick("left",838,482,1) SLeep($rand + 175) mouseclick("left",838,482,1) SLeep($rand + 175) mouseclick("left",838,482,1) SLeep($rand + 100) wend Func Stop() MsgBox(0, "AutoAlch", "Thank you for using!") Exit 0 EndFunc [/code]

item.title: -Auto alcher - [Made with autoitv3]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

n10si t:

I’m not sure if they still do because I can’t find it on their website.

I don’t believe they ever had it written down somewhere, but I do know there were forum posts regarding the question and they said it was allowed.

Did a quick search and found a wiki article: http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Mouse_keys

Read full topic

item.title: -Auto alcher - [Made with autoitv3]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:7, topic:416976”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=518915.msg3774910#msg3774910 date=1318018001]

There’s a reason people don’t use pixel-based auto-clickers anymore. Clicking the same pixels every time is not human-like.

If every so often the mouse changes position to a new spot on the alching spell/the item, it would be, Jagex allows using MouseKeys.

Oh really? I wasn’t aware of that.
[/quote]

I’m not sure if they still do because I can’t find it on their website.[/quote]

They probably did it to increase accessibility.

Read full topic

There’s a reason people don’t use pixel-based auto-clickers anymore. Clicking the same pixels every time is not human-like.

If every so often the mouse changes position to a new spot on the alching spell/the item, it would be, Jagex allows using MouseKeys.
[/quote]

Oh really? I wasn’t aware of that.[/quote]

I’m not sure if they still do because I can’t find it on their website.

item.title: -Auto alcher - [Made with autoitv3]
item.dc:creator: @rjj95 rjj95
item.description:
@rjj95 wrote:

Hey, so one day i was bored so i made a auto alcher with a decent antiban
its made so that you can sit there at the computer while semi paying attention and high alch!

how to use: show ALL spells in order!

-Future updates-(1 = i can do 2 = i need help 3 = i really need help with)

-Basic gui-1
-number of alchs to complete-2
-auto login-3
-randomly checking magic xp-2
-randomly qcing magic level-2
-checking if player is in random if is then logging out-3

Use this Version if your using rsbuddy client(maximised)

HotKeySet("{F6}", "stop") $answer = MsgBox(4, "AutoAlch Version 1.2", "Press F6 to stop. Start?") $rand = Random(600,900) If $answer = 7 Then MsgBox(0, "AutoAlch", "Thank you for using!") Exit EndIf SLeep($rand + 500) While 1 mousemove(830,443) SLeep($rand + 120) MouseClick("left",830,443,1) SLeep($rand + 175) mouseclick("left",830,443,1) SLeep($rand + 175) mouseclick("left",830,443,1) SLeep($rand + 100) wend Func Stop() MsgBox(0, "AutoAlch", "Thank you for using!") Exit 0 EndFunc
Use this version if your using google chrome:

HotKeySet("{F6}", "stop")
$answer = MsgBox(4, "AutoAlch Version 1.2", "Press F6 to stop. Start?")
$rand = Random(600,900)
If $answer = 7 Then
    MsgBox(0, "AutoAlch", "Thank you for using!")
    Exit
EndIf
SLeep($rand + 500)
While 1
mousemove(838,482)
SLeep($rand + 120)
MouseClick("left",838,482,1)
SLeep($rand + 175)
mouseclick("left",838,482,1)
SLeep($rand + 175)
mouseclick("left",838,482,1)
SLeep($rand + 100)
wend
Func Stop()
	MsgBox(0, "AutoAlch", "Thank you for using!")
Exit 0
EndFunc

Read full topic
